exceptions.tactic: unfold comp; unfold continuous in H1; unfold continuous in H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment X0 : forall D1 D2 : cpo, (D1 -> D2) -> Prop D1, D2, D3 : cpo f1 : D2 -> D1 f2 : D3 -> D2 X : (?B -> ?A) -> (?C -> ?B) -> ?C -> ?A x : monotone f2 H1 : forall s : chain D3, f2 (lim s) = lim [f2^^sbyx] x0 : monotone f1 H0 : forall s : chain D2, f1 (lim s) = lim [f1^^sbyx0] Unable to unify "f2 (lim ?M2344) = lim [f2^^?M2344byx]" with "exists M : monotone (fun x : D3 => f1 (f2 x)), forall s : chain D3, f1 (f2 (lim s)) = lim [fun x : D3 => f1 (f2 x)^^sbyM]".

original: intros. intros H1 H2. intros x. unfold comp; unfold continuous; intros. unfold comp; unfold continuous in H1; unfold continuous in H2. apply H1; apply H2.
